description: Updates the status for the specified findings.

parameters.name: analyzerArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the analyzer that generated the findings to update. The ARN of the analyzer that generated the findings to update.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: The state represents the action to take to update the finding Status. Use ARCHIVE to change an Active finding to an Archived finding. Use ACTIVE to change an Archived finding to an Active finding. Use ACTIVE to change an Archived finding to an Active finding.

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description:
The IDs of the findings to update.

(string) --- The IDs of the findings to update. (string) ---

parameters.name: resourceArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the resource identified in the finding.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description:
A client token.
This field is autopopulated if not provided. A client token. This field is autopopulated if not provided.
